bib_record.title: Neutron total cross-section measurement of 232-Th in the off-resonance region below 300 eV

free_txt: Kyoto University K.K., Y.F. experimental site
Transmission data were analyzed by the least square
Li-6 glass scintillator, 12.7 cm dia and
BF3 proportional counter for monitoring intensity
Uncertainty due to the correction of impurities
Water cooled photoneutron target made of
Ta-plates 5. x 5. cm square with an effective
5 cm thick polyethylene slab was used to moderate the
22 cm flight path perpendicular to the beam
Metallic plates 0.32 cm thick stacked to different
thicknesses. Purity 99.7%, the main impurities: H,C,O
